Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time spent on Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Average time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and Request Payment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time taken for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in any case
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Maximum time taken for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in any case
Metric: the maximum of the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and the last time instant when <ppinot4py.model.states.RuntimeState object at 0x00000268C41C9C10> - AppliesTo.PROCESS

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Payment Handled in cases where Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION occurs before Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR for cases ending with Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR after Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Difference in average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR between cases approved by BUDGET OWNER and cases directly approved by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurs

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to the next activity in the process flow
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases that require director approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by DIRECTOR occurs

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in domestic declaration cases versus international travel cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Total time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases that were finalized within two months after the trip
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case
